channel.title: Node & Git Installation on JavaScript
channel.description: Recent content in Node & Git Installation on JavaScript

item.title: Mac OS X Installation Instructions
item.description: Mac OS X Installation Instructions 1) Open your terminal application Open your terminal (Applications > Utilities > Terminal) All of the following commands (below) that start with $ should be copied and pasted in your terminal / command prompt (also referred to as the “command line”) DO NOT include the ‘$’ when copying and pasting the commands below; ‘$’ is a universal symbol for the terminal / command line

item.title: Windows Installation Instructions
item.description: Windows Installation Instructions 1) Open the Command Prompt application All of the following commands (below) that start with $ should be copied and pasted in your terminal / command prompt (also referred to as the “command line”) DO NOT include the ‘$’ when copying and pasting the commands below; ‘$’ is a universal symbol for the terminal / command line Press the enter / return key on your keyboard after pasting the command

item.title: Linux Installation Instructions
item.description: Linux Installation Instructions 1) Find and Open your Terminal / Command Prompt application All of the following commands (below) that start with $ should be copied and pasted in your terminal / command prompt (also referred to as the “command line”) DO NOT include the ‘$’ when copying and pasting the commands below; ‘$’ is a universal symbol for the terminal / command line Press the enter / return key on your keyboard after pasting the command
